comments:
[Build id: 200404020010]
Opening an editor other than the Java editor causes an exception.

A dialog appears saying: 
Unable to instantiate editor: org.eclipse.ui.DefaultTextEditor
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Plugin "org.eclipse.ui.editors" was 
unable to instantiate "org.eclipse.ui.editors.text.TextEditor".

To reproduce, start with a clean workspace. Create a new simple project. 
Create a file 'Test.txt'. Try to open the file.

Here's the stack trace:
